title: shiva kAmavardhini
sahitya:
shiva kAmavardhini bhava kAmamardhini citpara narttakiyE Om parAshakti


anupallavi

  navayuga lIlA vilAsini duhkka nAshini mandahAsini suhAsini bhakta hrdaya vAsini


caraNam    shrIkari shubhakari divya saundari candrashEkhari krpAkari bhArati
EkAmbara nAyaki sukhadAyaki yOgAmbikE sakala bhOga dAyaki dharma sahAyaki
